The Gaoping Yecuan Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the Yecuan Town of Gaoping City, Shanxi Province

operators: Shanxi Coal Transportation and Marketing Group Yechuan Coal Industry Company
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shanxi Coal Transportation and Marketing Group Yechuan Coal Industry Company, which is fully owned by Jinneng.
